sections.heading: operation; reckless or negligent; proof
sections.text: No person shall operate any motorboat or vessel or manipulate any water skis, surfboard, or similar device in a reckless or negligent manner so as to endanger the life, limb, or property of any person.SourceLaws 1978, LB 21, ยง 54;Laws 1989, LB 195, ยง 2.
